meanings.definition: The skill or art of steering a ship or boat.
meanings.sent1: His helmsmanships were evident as he smoothly guided the boat through the rough waters.
meanings.sent2: The captain's helmsmanships were crucial in avoiding the rocks near the shore.
meanings.sent3: With his helmsmanships, he could probably steer a toy boat in a bathtub!
meanings.sent4: Her helmsmanships were like a compass, always pointing the right way.
meanings.sent5: The helmsmanships of the old sailor were legendary, tales of his expertise passed down through generations.

meanings.definition: The ability to navigate or direct a course.
meanings.sent1: She relied on her helmsmanships to lead the group through the dense forest.
meanings.sent2: The helmsmanships of the air traffic controller ensured the planes landed safely.
meanings.sent3: His helmsmanships in finding the best pizza place in town were unmatched.
meanings.sent4: The helmsmanships of the detective led them straight to the hidden treasure.
meanings.sent5: With his helmsmanships, he steered his life in the direction of success and happiness.
